items: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
understands Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, and Primordial but can't speak

blocks.name: Freedom of Movement
blocks.text: [name] ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

blocks.name: Siege Monster
blocks.text: [name] deals double damage to objects and structures.

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [name] makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

blocks.name: Bite
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[3d8 + str] piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by [name], that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside [name], and it takes dmg[12d6] acid damage at the start of each of [name]'s turns. If [name] takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, [name] must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of [name]. If [name] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

blocks.name: Tentacle
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[3d6 + str] bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. [name] has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

blocks.name: Fling
blocks.text: One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by [name] is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes dmg[1d6] bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

blocks.name: Lightning Storm
blocks.text: [name] magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target [name] can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking dmg[4d10] lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

blocks.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
blocks.text: [name] makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

blocks.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
blocks.text: While underwater, [name] expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than [name]. Each creature other than [name] that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking dmg[3d10] poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of [name]'s next turn.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
